      • getPropertyFigure

        public Shape getPropertyFigure()
        Description copied from class: FigureController
        Get the figure that is used for controlling the properties of this controller.

        The figure returned is by default the same as the FigureController.getFigure(). But in some cases it might be necessary to return a different figure.

        Specified by:
        getPropertyFigure in class ShapeController
        Returns:
        the figure that should the attributes applied
